Minjae

Korean: 민재

Full name:
Koo Min-jae
Native name:
구민재
Group (2023-present):
VVS

Introduction

Minjae is a South Korean singer signed with Wannabe Entertainment. He is part of the pre-debut boy group VVS.

On August 19, 2023, his individual concept photos were released through the group’s official SNS.
